Html:
I got an idea. Why don't you pull professions from the armory when you load a character?

1. Some professions got passive bonuses (Mining, Skinning)

2. BoP benefits could automatically be enabled/disabled for optimizer (BS sockets, JC epic gems, Ring Enchants, etc.)

Most of these already are loaded from the Armory, since they're on your gear. The passive buffs are a simple click in the Buffs tab. We don't expect to explicitly define what professions a character has.
